items.summary: Add a new PowerPointToPdfPage component at frontend/src/pages/PowerPointToPdfPage.tsx that allows users to upload PowerPoint files (.ppt, .pptx) and convert them to PDF format with drag-and-drop file upload support, following the same UI patterns as ExcelToPdfPage and WordToPdfPage

Create a utility function frontend/src/utils/powerPointToPdf.ts that converts PowerPoint files to PDF format, following the same structure and error handling patterns as excelToPdf.ts and wordToPdf.ts, with progress callback support

Add a PowerPoint to PDF card to the ConvertIntoPdfPage grid at frontend/src/pages/ConvertIntoPdfPage.tsx that links to the new PowerPoint conversion page, positioned after the Excel to PDF card and following the same styling pattern

Add routing configuration for the PowerPoint to PDF page in frontend/src/App.tsx, creating a new route at /tools/powerpoint-to-pdf that lazy-loads PowerPointToPdfPage, following the same pattern as other tool routes

Add internationalization keys for PowerPoint to PDF feature in frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts, including page titles, upload instructions, button labels, and error messages in both English and Spanish, following the naming pattern used for other conversion tools
Add a PowerPoint to PDF link to the homepage tool grid at frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx, positioned logically among other conversion tools with appropriate icon and description
